entry.title: $2675 // __NO FEE__Stunning LUXURY 1BR w/ Balcony _Rooftop_Gym_Elevator!
entry.content:
Stunning LUXURY 1BR

Listing ID #: 155102
Price: $2,675
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 1.0
Bathrooms: 1.0

Building Amenities

Elevator

Apartment Amenities

Balcony
Dishwasher
Granite Kitchen
Hardwood
High Ceilings
Light
Renovated

Wonderful 1 Bedroom with private balcony - NO FEE - Stunning spacious 1 Bedroom apartment in a brand new building close to Astoria Blvd train stop (NW) - Bedroom easily fits queen size bed - Island kitchen with all modern appliances - Hardwood floors throughout the unit - Ample closet space - Heat, hot water and cooking gas included in the rent - Central heat and AC - Large private balcony as well as common furnished rooftop with BBQ Building features: - Elevator - Laundry - Gym - Jacuzzi

Contact me to schedule a showing

Olga Breise

Phone: (646) 806-9998
Email: olga@bouklisgroup.com

The Bouklis GroupÂ
